Reviews.Title: nice
Reviews.Author: ElenaP.
Reviews.Content: Bought for my daughter and still working. I'd say that is pretty good. It is exactly as advertised and keeps her busy.

Reviews.Title: good tablet for the price
Reviews.Author: cristina
Reviews.Content: we ordered this for our 5 year old  for her birthday cuz she wont stay off ours this tablet  is pretty cool does every thing  you want it to do it  is just a little slow sometimes but all she needs it for is games  and music and I love that it has goggle play she is downloading all the apps she wants this is great for kids the only thing I don't like about is u cant find any good cases for it other then that im pleased and it got here really fast

Reviews.Title: Runs too slow!!!
Reviews.Author: Psychologygirl
Reviews.Content: I have tried to get this tablet to perform faster but it remains too slow for me to work with.  I deleted unnecessary apps in hopes that it would speed up but has had no luck.

Reviews.Title: Afunta 7-inch Allwinner A13 Q88+Dual Camera Tablet Pc Android 4.0 1.2ghz...
Reviews.Author: Ida R. L. Varnedoe
Reviews.Content: So far, I noticed that it is slow, and it freezes up so quickly. I just don't know why it does that all of the time. I also am just getting to know to operate it with the help from my son. The directions isn't quite clear to me fully; so basically with my son's help; we're doing things just from experience. I see how it works out for me before my 30 day warranty is up. God bless us all.

Reviews.Title: I'm not happy ...I can't games
Reviews.Author: julian nelson saunders
Reviews.Content: I cannot play games for whatever reason the state is automatically put into this tablet and Its not a match for my zip code so now I can play the games... I'm pissed

Reviews.Title: Pretty and pink.
Reviews.Author: b a hier
Reviews.Content: Bought for a 4yr old and a week later it's still working. I'd say that is pretty good. It is exactly as advertised and keeps my granddaughter busy so that is a clincher for me.

ProductInfo.Features:
Allwinner A13 1.2 GHz 7 inch capacitive Touchscreen Android 4.0 OS.RAM DDR3 512M ROM 4GB.
Dual Cameras Front 0.3MP Back 0.3MP Support WIFI, 4 way gravity-sensor, flash player 11.1.
Built in 4GB memory and support MICRO SD/TF card up to 32GB which allows enough space to download freely.
Portable and super slim design 5-points multi-touch capacitive touch screen for convenient operation.
Wi-Fi (802.11 a/b/g/n),2300mAh Battery for longer usage time.Skype video chat, HD games ,Netflix Movies
ProductInfo.Name: Afunta 7-inch Allwinner A13 Q88+ Dual Camera Tablet Pc Android 4.0 1.2ghz CPU Multiple Touch Capactive Screen 512mb RAM 4gb HDD Wifi (Pink)
